Class SubDrawPile

  • java.lang.Object
    • uy.LinkedStack
      • uy.DrawPile
        • uy.SubDrawPile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PileAndDrawPileInterface

    public class SubDrawPile
extends DrawPile
    Implements the characteristics of a sub_draw_pile which is the pile where the card immediately taken from the draw pile goes to
    Version:
    1.8.0_60
    Author:
    Arlan Uy
